item.title: Understand the stack and the heap
item.description: What is stack and what is heap in term of memory allocating in programming language? While learning Rust, I met with ownership subject. This topic discuss about memory allocation on Rust. So I decide to learn more about how memory management in general works for programming language. About Stack and Heap This is how programming language store it’s data on memory (not database) , stuff like variable need a place to be stored while running the program.
